short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Moves created bookmarks to the top of their folder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension moves newly created bookmarks to the top of their folder. There is also an option to move bookmarks to the top after they are moved to a different folder.
